recipesJson.name: Juicy
recipesJson.author: super8line
recipesJson.description:
"It was all a dream, I used to read Word Up magazine" 

This is my first original recipe that I've felt was worthy of making public.  I think it's fantastic.  The 3 watermelon's blend together well and the cactus just makes it perfect juicy watermelon deliciousness.

reviews.text: Not a big fan of this one but I guess taste is subjective
